in graphite, top, crossed out: At Mr. Crestwell. 9 New Sq. Lincolns Inn. | Mr Rd Litchfield | Buntingford. Royston Balls | 10. Cartin | from Cambridge to Oxford Patton Bedford N. Pagnel, Stratford | Buckingham Bicester. Oxford X to Cambridge
in graphite, below, center: Ashton, see Monument, Ach. Jun. St John's | ant chapel north side [underlined], Cam- | ordinary fillet, in front of houses | above windows, all across | the house. 
in graphite, lower right: Cambridge

titles.title: Album containing 99 original drawings and 87 architecture, portrait, and costume studies of a documentary nature for the paintings Latimer Preaching at Paul's Cross and The Martyrdom of Ridley and Latimer.
